org.sensorhub.impl.sensor

Class AbstractSensorOutput<SensorType extends ISensorModule<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.sensor.AbstractSensorOutput<SensorType>
  • Type Parameters:
    SensorType - Type of parent sensor
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventProducer, ISensorDataInterface

    public abstract class AbstractSensorOutput<SensorType extends ISensorModule<?>>
extends Object
implements ISensorDataInterface

    Class providing default implementation of common sensor data interface API methods. By default, push is reported as supported and storage is reported as unsupported.

    Copyright (c) 2013

    Since:
    Nov 2, 2014
    Author:
    Alexandre Robin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int clearAllRecords()
      Clears all records currently stored in driver or sensor memory.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
      List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> getAllRecords(boolean clear)
      Retrieves all records stored by the driver or sensor.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.

      Retrieves the N last records stored.
      This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.

      Retrieves number of record currectly available from driver or on-board sensor memory.

      • isPushSupported

        public boolean isPushSupported()
        Description copied from interface: ISensorDataInterface
        Checks push capability

        Note that 'push' can generally be simulated by the driver even if the sensor doesn't support it natively.

        Specified by:
        isPushSupported in interface ISensorDataInterface
        Returns:
        true if notifications are sent when new data is available, false otherwise

      • isStorageSupported

        public boolean isStorageSupported()
        Description copied from interface: ISensorDataInterface
        Checks data storage capability

        Note that storage can be provided by the sensor itself or by the driver.

        Specified by:
        isStorageSupported in interface ISensorDataInterface
        Returns:
        true if record storage is supported internally, false otherwise

      • getStorageCapacity

        public int getStorageCapacity()
                       throws SensorException
        Description copied from interface: ISensorDataInterface
        Gets the internal storage capacity.
        This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
        Specified by:
        getStorageCapacity in interface ISensorDataInterface
        Returns:
        maximum number of records that can be stored
        Throws:
        SensorException - if storage is not supported or a problem occured while checking sensor on-board storage capacity

      • getLatestRecords

        public List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> getLatestRecords(int maxRecords,
                                                   boolean clear)
                                                     throws SensorException
        Description copied from interface: ISensorDataInterface
        Retrieves the N last records stored.
        This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
        Specified by:
        getLatestRecords in interface ISensorDataInterface
        Parameters:
        maxRecords - Maximum number of records to retrieve
        clear - if true, also clears records from driver or sensor memory
        Returns:
        a list of records sorted by acquisition time (empty if no records are available)
        Throws:
        SensorException - if storage is not supported or a problem occured while reading from on-board sensor storage

      • getAllRecords

        public List<net.opengis.swe.v20.DataBlock> getAllRecords(boolean clear)
                                                  throws SensorException
        Description copied from interface: ISensorDataInterface
        Retrieves all records stored by the driver or sensor.
        This method must be implemented if ISensorDataInterface.isStorageSupported() returns true.
        Specified by:
        getAllRecords in interface ISensorDataInterface
        Parameters:
        clear - if true, also clears records from driver or sensor memory
        Returns:
        the list of all records in storage sorted by acquisition time (empty if no records are available)
        Throws:
        SensorException - if storage is not supported or a problem occured while reading from on-board sensor storage

        Returns:
